title: PHPrequireKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPrequireKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Use require to add a footer to a page:

Welcome to my home page!

Some text.

Some more text.

Definition and Usage The require keyword is used to embed PHP code from another file. If the file is not found, a fatal error is thrown and the program stops. Related Pages The include keyword The include_once keyword The require_once keyword Read more about including files in our PHP Include Files Tutorial . ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPrequireKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPrequireKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPrequireKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
